body_content.explanation: the quality of being smooth, shiny, and lying close to the body, and therefore looking well cared for; the quality of not being untidy and having no parts sticking out:
examples: This dryer was powerful and fast and gave hair sleekness and body.
The goggles hug the eyes, giving a feeling of athletic sleekness.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being modern and fashionable, especially in a way that is simple and clean:
examples: Most of the polluting factories have gone, replaced by hi-tech sleekness and eco-friendly modernity.
We take enormous pride in the sleekness and simplicity of our website.
